episodes.title: Groomed at Seven Inside a Religious Cult
episodes.description:
Martha Kartaoui was only seven years old when care turned into control. Raised inside a closed religious group, she was isolated from her family and taught that obedience meant safety.

Years later, Martha shares how grooming, punishment, and authority hid in plain sight—and how long it took to understand what was done to her. This is a powerful story about survival, silence, and reclaiming your voice after growing up inside a cult.

#cultsurvivor #trauma #survivalstory 

Thank you for watching Unfiltered Stories! We offer a platform for our guests to speak openly about their life stories and journeys, shedding light on the challenges they faced and the resilience they've shown.
Our mission is to raise awareness about survivors by delving into their stories, exploring the impact of their experiences, and how they've managed to heal and rebuild their lives.
By sharing these stories, we aim to break the silence surrounding those challenging memories and create a compassionate environment.

Find Martha Kartaoui on her socials:
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@letgloryshine

episodes.title: Married at 3, Forced to Obey a Cult Leader
episodes.description:
At just 3 years old, Serena Kelly was married to a 68-year-old cult leader. Born into the notorious Children of God cult, her childhood was stolen, controlled, and documented in ways most of us can’t even imagine. From being forced to obey adults to living under constant manipulation, her story is one of survival, resilience, and reclaiming her life.

In this video, we dive deep into her experience, the shocking rules she had to follow, and how she finally escaped the cult’s grip. This is a story about courage, survival, and finding freedom after unimaginable control.

#childrenofgod #cultsurvivor #survivalstory 

Thank you for watching Unfiltered Stories! We offer a platform for our guests to speak openly about their life stories and journeys, shedding light on the challenges they faced and the resilience they've shown.
Our mission is to raise awareness about survivors by delving into their stories, exploring the impact of their experiences, and how they've managed to heal and rebuild their lives.
By sharing these stories, we aim to break the silence surrounding those challenging memories and create a compassionate environment.

episodes.title: She Survived the World’s Most Twisted Cult
episodes.description:
Kim Kelley was raised in one of the world’s most twisted cults — The Children of God.

Behind the smiling faces and promises of faith was a world of control, fear, and unthinkable abuse. Her mother was one of the leaders, writing manuals that shaped thousands of children’s lives, while she and her siblings were left in the hands of notorious cult figures.

In this video, she shares her powerful story: growing up without a childhood, escaping the cult at 20 years old, and finding the strength to heal. From being forced into secrecy to living in compounds hidden from the outside world, her survival is nothing short of remarkable.

This is not just a story of pain — it’s a story of courage, truth, and reclaiming freedom.

#cultsurvivor #childrenofgod #truestory 

Thank you for watching Unfiltered Stories! We offer a platform for our guests to speak openly about their life stories and journeys, shedding light on the challenges they faced and the resilience they've shown.
Our mission is to raise awareness about survivors by delving into their stories, exploring the impact of their experiences, and how they've managed to heal and rebuild their lives.

episodes.title: She Survived Trafficking and Cult Abuse
episodes.description:
Today on Unfiltered Stories, we uncover the harrowing journey of Elizabeth Sonboum, born into a family entangled in crime. She was the product of a hidden relationship between her uncle and mother, leading to years of abuse. As a child, her mother's boyfriend trafficked her, and she was later adopted into a cult where the mistreatment continued. Elizabeth's story is one of survival amidst unimaginable circumstances.
Follow Elizabeth here:

episodes.title: Growing Up In A Christian Cult with an Abusive Sister
episodes.description:
Today on Unfiltered Stories, Cody Cook shares his journey of overcoming deep-seated traumas and finding healing. Adopted as a child, Cody faced feelings of abandonment and was raised in a Christian cult where his entire life revolved around the church. He was also subjected to SA by his older sister, leaving him scarred and distrustful of women into adulthood. Despite these challenges, Cody has worked towards healing and rebuilding his life. Join us to hear Cody's powerful story of resilience and recovery.
#survivorstories #resilience  #healingjourney  #overcomingtrauma

episodes.title: Abused In The Cult "Children Of God" By My Own Parents
episodes.description:
In today's episode of Unfiltered Stories, Philip Seibel shares his life story with us. Philip was born and raised within the cult known as The Children of God, where he spent the majority of his life until he managed to escape. During his time there, he endured significant pain and humiliation inflicted by his stepfather and mother, as well as by other members of the cult who made him suffer.
Join us as we delve into Philip's inspiring journey from suffering to resilience
#childrenofgod #cult #csa

episodes.title: I Tried To Take My Own Life Because Of A Cult
episodes.description:
In today's episode of Unfiltered Stories Onami House shares her life story with us. Born into the cult known as "Children of God," which later adopted the name "The Family," Onami's early life was overshadowed by the monotonous routine and relentless brainwashing of the cult. The experiences within the cult took a significant toll on Onami, leading her to a point of desperation at just 13 years old when she tried to take her own life. However, against all odds, she found the strength to escape the church.
She channeled her pain into a healing process and wrote a book about her journey, with the hope of helping others who have endured trauma.
#ChildrenofGod #cult #trauma

Follow Onami on Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mami.onami

episodes.title: My Family Made Me Participate In Their Scary Rituals
episodes.description:
In today's episode of Unfiltered Stories, our guest Mary Knight shares her story with us. As a survivor of ritualistic CSA and trafficking, she was subjected to many horrendous acts at the hands of her family. Even though they looked normal from the outside, the family made her participate in their scary rituals, making her fear for her life. Today, she not only sheds light on the reality of these heinous acts but also creates awareness and contributes to breaking the cycle of silence surrounding ritualistic CSA.
#CSA #Rituals #survivor

Check out Mary’s book: https://www.amazon.com/My-Life-Now-Trafficking-Survivor-ebook/dp/B0BKH7MS38
Follow Mary on social media: https://linktr.ee/maryknighthappy

On Unfiltered Stories, we offer a platform for our guests to speak openly about their life stories and journeys, shedding light on the challenges they faced and the resilience they've shown.
Our mission is to raise awareness about various forms of trauma, such as abuse, violence, loss, and other life-altering events by delving into the survivor's story, exploring the impact of their experiences and how they've managed to heal and rebuild their lives.
By sharing these stories, we aim to break the silence surrounding trauma and create a compassionate environment.

episodes.title: My Father Is The Prophet Of The FLDS, Warren Jeffs
episodes.description:
My father is the prophet of the FLDS, Warren Jeffs...

In today's episode of Unfiltered Stories, we are speaking with Sarah Thompson who escaped the dangerous FLDS cult. Sarah's father is the infamous 'prophet' of the FLDS church Warren Jeffs. She grew up being manipulated and taken away from her Mother, even after he was in prison her father was ruling their lives. Eventually, she and her mother were able to escape, this is Sarah's story of how she escaped and adjusted to 'normal life.


#UnfilteredStories #FLDS #WarrenJeffs
